comment: Karma. Irony. Call it why you will : Actor who played Marlboro Man in ads dies from smoking-related disease
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Karma"))
      :snt2 (ii / Irony)
      :snt3 (c / call-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (ii2 / it)
            :ARG2 (a / amr-unknown
                  :ARG0-of (c2 / cause-01
                        :ARG1 (c3 / call-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG1 ii2))))
      :snt4 (d / die-01
            :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :ARG0-of (a2 / act-01)
                  :ARG0-of (p3 / play-02
                        :ARG1 (p4 / person
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Marlboro"
                                    :op2 "Man"))
                        :ARG2 (a3 / advertise-01)))
            :ARG1-of c2
            :ARG0 (d2 / disease
                  :ARG1-of (r / relate-01
                        :ARG2 (s / smoke-02)))))
